name: How to Use Spells for Conversion

pages.title: Spell Conversion
pages.text: $(#000000)Here's how to convert items using spells.$(br2)Just fire the correct magic at the item you want to convert—it's that simple.

pages.title: Charging Fluorite
pages.text: $(#000000)Here’s how to charge fluorite with mana.$(br2)As explained earlier, place fluorite on a suitable surface and hit it with ‘Enercrux.’$(br2)You’ll get a beautifully glowing fluorite.

pages.title: Fluorite
pages.text: $(#000000)You can find plenty of these crystals underground. If you run out, go explore some caves.
$(#000000)Well, that's how some spells can affect objects. Try experimenting with them.
